reviews.review: 值得一玩
为什么我老是卡死，有没有大佬指点一下QAQ   (我用的是拯救者y7000p)

[u]1st of all ignore my time played as Steam somehow didn't record the time I played in offline mode. Now let's go to the review.[/u]

[h1]I'll divide the review in 3 parts 
[list]
    [*]The story
    [*]The characters
    [*]The gameplay & mechanics
[/list][/h1]

[hr]                                                                                                                                                                                            [/hr]

[h1]Before I start the review l'd like to talk a bit about the "Bioshock" series.[/h1] Bioshock is a single-player FPS series. The 1st 2 installments were incredibly good, one of the best single-player games I've ever played. Continuing the legacy Bioshock Infinite gives a simillar experience as the previous versions but with a completely world, new environment & new characters. The 1st 2 games gave off a horror style, thriller & claustrophobic vibe but this one is the complete opposite. It's open, fresh & vibrant. When you 1st enter the game, just from the menu you'll understand what I'm trying to say.

[hr]                                                                                                                                                                                            [/hr]

The [h1]characters[/h1] I won't say much about them as it may ruin your experience in exploring them on your own. Basically the whole game revolves around 3 characters i.e, our protagonist [b]Booker Dewitt[/b], the 'heroine' [b]Elizabeth[/b] & the 'villain' [b]Zachary Comstock[/b]. There are several more important characters like the [b]Mr&Mrs.Lutece[/b]. Dewitt is a man with a past which we will discover more about as we progress in the game. He is strong, stubborn, will go to any length for his mission & sometimes a bit too mean. Elizabeth is like a princess with mysterious power. She knows her things but is careful enough to not get overconfident. Comstock is like your usual villain, wants more power to rule over the world. Keeps his daughter in a tower to protect her from outside influences. You won't get to meet with him that much in the game but you will discover about his evil 'works' as the story progresses. Mr&Mrs.Lutece are a couple shrouded with mystery. You will meet them at random times in the game to help the story to progress. The enemies this time were different ( as the world this time was different ) but just on the surface levels. There were some side charcaters which help in the better understanding of the story & the world. 
[b]8.5/10[/b]

[hr]                                                                                                                                                                                            [/hr]

The [h1]story[/h1] is I'd say the most wierdest part of the game. I loved it & didn't liked it at the same time. There were certain things if removed wouldn't make much of an impact but other than that I loved every part of the story. I'll again refrain from saying certain things so as to not give spoilers. The way the mysteries were handled, the flashbacks, the plot twists were just amazing. The story really helped in reaching a better understanding of the characters & the world itself. I'd even like to argue that story & characters are really intertwined with each other which in turn makes the game really feel alive & enjoyable.
[b]8.5[/b]

[hr]                                                                                                                                                                                            [/hr]

The [h1]gameplay & mechanics[/h1] is the place where you can say it's not much different from the previous Bioshock installments. Everything was pretty much the same but with just a different name. The powers & enemies were different from the outside but from the gameplay pov it was the same. It was good, really enjoyable as the controls felt much firmer & easy to use. There's the grappling hook that you can use to travel between certain areas ( tbh every now & then I'd get lost while using it but still the experience was enjoyable ). Elizabeth will help you out a lot in the game. She will use her lockpicking skills to open locked doors & lockers. I never felt I was short on lockpicks too so there's that. She will give you ammo & health while fighting & money while exploring regions. The graphics is a strong part of the game. Even after 7 years it looks really good, it really aged well. The vibrancy, the colour palette, the environment all gave a really [b]pleasurable playing experience[/b]. The art was kind of unique I'd say but definitely good. Overall gameplay & mechanics were good. 
[b]8.5/10[/b]

[hr]                                                                                                                                                                                            [/hr]

Overally I'd say that Bioshock Infinite is heck of a game that every Bioshock fan should play. For ones who have never played a Bioshock game I'd say the experience will be a okay~ish as you will miss out on important things that's related to the previous games. I still like the 1st Bioshock more than Infinite but that's just my personal opinion.

[b]Rating - 8.5/10 REALLY REALLY GOOD[/b]
最早是玩的盗版，后来用了STEAM直接入手正版，再次回味一次，操作手感，剧情设定，引人入胜，希望以后还有其他类似的作品，可惜很少能玩到类似的，在阳光明媚的哥伦比亚和伊丽莎白一起逃生真的太美了，伊丽莎白真好看，我真的好喜欢蒸汽朋克

Jogo incrível! É divertido, com gráficos legais, apenas algumas vezes a animação e a qualidade de personagens é um pouco baixa. Gostei bastante da liberdade, além do sistema de viajar pelos "trilhos", me incomoda poder usar apenas 2 armas por vez, e se quiser usar outra, precisar trocar. Contudo, recomendo jogar.

Astonishing art, wonderful script, fast and fluid gameplay. Much more luminous then the previous two (you won't find the horror element in this one) but with the a great focus on character development. Be sure to play both Burial at Sea DLCs, which add a closure to the story, and each provides a unique and new gameplay mode. Very much recommended.

One of my favorite story-driven games of all time. Would recommend to anyone looking for something to either kill time or to really dive in deep.

Don't get me wrong, I love story-based games, but I couldn't even truly experience it as I was so incredibly bored in the first few minutes of playing this game. Would not recommend.

Story was very engaging the entire game. Combat, on the other hand, was not very difficult, unless you're someone who plays games solely for story. 

The player gets to know the main characters very well along with some side characters who pertain to the backstory. 

If you have never played the Bioshock, this game stands alone in the series. This game does not have to be played before the other two games. 

Overall, this has easily become one of my favorite video game series to play.

The story isn't bad, its quite nice actually, but if you're looking for a deep story like the other Bioshock 1, then this game isn't for you, but I do recommend buying this game when it's on sale.

《生化奇兵：无限》惊艳的画面表现，初次见到“天空之城”的玩家必然会为眼前那充满童话色彩的景色所震撼，棉花糖一样的白云上漂浮着精致的建筑，横跨天际的铁轨上急驶着老式的电车，远处宏伟的雕像旁游荡着浮夸的飞空艇，回望身边，城市的人们全穿着得体的衣服，堆着刻意的谄笑，过着无忧无虑的生活，一切都显得那样超凡脱俗与纤尘不染……但这真的是人类该有的生活吗？眼前唯美的画面中隐隐的流露出一股让人不安的虚伪来。

This is easily one of the best games of all time(IMO) and it perfects the Bioshock collection. Make sure you play Bioshock before playing this, and all in all make sure you play this game!

As a standalone game, it has an amazing story that had me hooked, and I could never predict the way it would go.
Combat was fluid, and the companion was not annoying at all, in fact every time I wasn't next to her the game would be boring.

If you're new to the series: this game will be an amazing way to introduce yourself to the older ones.
If you've already played the series before: it would obviously never hold up to the success of the first games, but it does NOT disappoint.
Great gameplay, beautiful visuals (especially for a 2013 game) and incredible writing, voice acting and story

슬슬 한번더 돌릴 예정인 게임

Леди и Джентельмены, игра изумительна! Начнём с мира: Колумбия прекрасна! Светит солнце, блики на витринах магазинов, кругом деревья и цветы - очень красочный и живой мир! Динамичный экшн не даст за скучать: как и во 2 bioshock тоники можно использовать вместе с оружием, при том что у них появилось 2 режима использования, что дает массу комбинаций смертоубийства. Сюжет занимателен, концовка  потрясает! Из минусов: тониками можно и не пользоватся (я сам пол игры пробежал исключительно с автоматом), враги не запяменаются и не вызывают эмоций (вспомните те ощущения когда видете первый раз большого папочку в первой части, и последующие встречи к бою с ним готовишся весь уровень) ну и в целом игра стала проще ( я играя на средней сложности умер 2 раза, против 10-12 того же bioshock 1 & 2). Но в целом очень советую к приобретению, шедевр!

要说生化奇兵是游戏，我觉得游戏的玩法很单一，只能突突突和搜刮东西，不算很好玩
但要说这是个艺术品，我觉得毫不为过，因为这游戏对剧情的叙述能力真的太强了！！2013年的作品过了七年还是能给我带来很大的震撼！
不愧是被称为“第九艺术”的作品！
Awesome

Columbia，Rapture。
每个世界都有扇门——灯塔，每个世界都有那么一对父女。
————————————————————————————
作为一款剧情游戏，我会给《Bioshock：Infinity》的剧情打个9.5/10分。
剧情不多剧透了，果然三维的故事如果拉升一个或两个维度就会使故事变得无比精彩。
而《Bioshock：Infinity》在游戏性上也有出色的表现。
世界的可探索度，玩法的挖掘等等，这些都使《Bioshock：Infinity》这个可游玩的精彩小说无比耐玩。
然而事实则是，我到通关为止，游戏的有些游玩功能我都没怎么用过。
女儿作为一个优秀的NPC，我到通关为止，除了最后飞船上的最后战斗以外，我都没怎么用过女儿的能力。整个游戏过程我就拿着把来复枪爆对面的头，如果是非人类敌人就多来几枪。我基本就没怎么被女儿救治过，我和女儿互动最多的除了剧情必要的以外就是女儿定期给你的钱。而且游戏过程中也被我发现了Bug以至于警局那里女儿和我走丢了，淦，丢了才发现自己一个人探索哥伦比亚还是挺孤单的。
音乐上《Bioshock：Infinity》也是十分用心的，不信可以去搜一下OST听一下，基本上听着OST可以回忆起一幕幕经典场景。
如果说游戏有什么问题的话，那就是地图可探索元素太多了，以至于我每张图都一处一处摸过去，以至于越玩越觉得累和费时间，虽然说游戏剧情是真的引人入胜。以及游戏场景太抓眼睛了，经常停下来看风景。
————————————————————————————————
有一点，海葬DLC必买。

Oh my god. Im a huge fan of the Bioshock series ever since it came out, and this game still surprises me since the Xbox 360 days. Infinite is rather different than the other two Bioshock games, but the story follows the same path, and the fighting is still the same, though you don't have 'infinite' pockets to hold your guns anymore, ironic. This is by far one of my favorite games, and my favorite in the Bioshock series. Something about the NPCs, the new Columbia characters, and Booker and Elizabeth's synergy is incredible, and a huge step forward in the Bioshock series.
Like i said, the fighting is the same, but it doesn't mean that you have the same tools for the job too. The weapons feel less DIY with tons of weird upgrades, and more realistic, reminding you of old World War weapons and such, and the Plasmids (now Vigors) are so unique, with remakes of the classic ones like Incinerate and Devil's Kiss, and Insect Swarm and Murder of Crows.
The game is impecable, the story is great, the guns are fun to use and the plasmids, well, wreck everything, it is definitely worth buying.

And if you're looking to buy Burial at Sea, do it, but after you fully understand the Bioshock lore, trust me, it hits hard like a truck, but it is worth for the different gameplay and scenery.

11/10
ya gauy

Bioshock infinite is one the best game I've ever played before. Greatest story, desent gameplay which include new mechanic's in whole series. Most importantly, whichever choice you make it will lead to one of the most memorable endings in the gaming industry.

10/10

Took me a long time to finally get to play this game. I've played the original and skipped Bioshock 2 after reading what it's about on the forums. I could not finish the original for one simple reason: I had splicers coming at me at all times, even when I wanted to see what's going on with the story and I couldn't really enjoy it. However this is not the case in Bioshock infinite: Fighting time is for fighting, story time is for story. And the latter is why I got into the saga in the first place. Boy what a journey that was... Truly a piece of art.
Just gonna say that the ending had me in tears. Recommended af.

Oh how awful a game this is. Like some bad acid trip. And vulgar. Poor controls. Chaotic nonsense. Like a bad nightmare dream. Just disgusting. And people like this sort of thing? This game has a good rating? Really? Oh that makes me worried for the human condition today. I have never played a game that makes me sick to my stomach. The pink elephants in the Disney cartoon Dumbo and the Ommpla Loopas munchkins in the Wizard of Oz gave me this unsettled sensation. Where has sense gone today? People like this? Im glad Im in the evening of my life and not just starting out. I dont want to see what will become of this world.

1代本体质量最高氛围营造最好，但技能繁琐，不能调亮度各种让人眼瞎。
2代闪退N次，技能优化，但补给又变得太多，那个女反派的思想没一点水平全程双标还敢对标人民公社拉胯至极自然被人诟病。(但二代大老爹很帅)
3代又改变后10小时困难都和和晴天逛街一样惬意，和1代困难的刚钻大老爹这么玩得当场投胎，很适合大家图乐一逛。
海葬2DLC不光几乎完美连接13代(少量吃书)，还让这个系列的角色塑造瞬间从普通拔高到了伊丽莎白可以竞争游戏史上最有魅力的女主角的水平（何耐有的男角色魅力太过），确实值得一玩（海葬2结尾的板钳是1代的第一个武器，小女孩也是1代第一个碰见的，细节还是有的）
太优秀了
haowan
Очень хорошая игра, играю с первой части, все м советую пройти всю антологию.

7年过去了，补票再玩一次，依旧觉得是FPS史上剧情最好的游戏（除了DLC）
DLC就有点拉跨了，不管剧情还是游戏长度来说，刚打完本体再去打只有一个感受：就这？不是有大奶版伊丽莎白看我觉得3分都有点多了

Bioshock Infinite is a game with a story so surface level anyone can understand yet so deep that it makes the seeking of knowledge fun. Alongside great mechanics, the gameplay always feels smooth. A must play for any PC gamer

[h1] Ты боишься Бога? [/h1]

Не только игра года 2013, но и шедевр на все времена, который нельзя не перепройти. Графика и стиль, сюжет и постановка сцен, музыка и атмосфера - здесь идеально всё. Не слушайте людей, жалующихся на упрощение геймплея по сравнению с первой частью. Геймплей здесь проработан ровно настолько, насколько это нужно было визионеру, чтобы рассказать свою историю. Спасибо Кену Левину за это чудо и за Элизабет, в которую трудно не влюбиться. До сих пор храню автограф Ани Молевой с ИгроМира 2013.
